TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AttachablePropertyServices extends System.Object
public ref class AttachablePropertyServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一些静态帮助器方法，这些方法用于从可附加属性中获取值和访问器方法信息，并且和附加的属性存储一起工作。

span.span: Provides static helper methods that obtain values and accessor method information from an attachable property and that work with an attached property store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的大多数功能依赖于的附加的属性存储，且通常实现接口。Most functionality in this class relies on an attached property store, which generally implements the interface. 但是，传递到存储的参数不类型化为接口和改为被类型化为`object`。However, parameters for passing the store into are not typed as the interface and are instead typed as `object`. 这是因为你可以传递任意对象，并且在这种情况下，使用内部默认的可附加的属性存储。This is because you can pass an arbitrary object, and in this case, an internal default attachable property store is used. 对于任意对象的最佳做法是以传递对象，否则可能与应用商店关联。Best practice for the arbitrary object is to pass the object that would otherwise be associated with the store. 不要将传递`null`以指示不具有使用。Do not pass `null` to indicate that you do not have an to use. 传递`null`进入不执行任何操作的代码路径。Passing `null` enters code paths that do nothing. 将对象传递为非 null，但计算结果为`null`上尝试强制转换，将使用默认的可附加的属性存储。Passing an object that is non-null, but evaluates as `null` on an attempted cast, uses the default attachable property store.

summary.span: 从指定的可附加属性存储中复制所有可附加属性/值对，并将它们复制到目标数组中。

span.span: Copies all attachable property/value pairs from a specified attachable property store and into a destination array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，将调用基础使用键/值对，这可能是未列出本主题中的异常的根源的约束的实现。Calling this method invokes an underlying implementation that is constrained with a key/value pair, which might be the source of exceptions that are not listed in this topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储是每个实例;因此，在存储区中，`name`值应为明确。Stores are per instance; therefore, in a store, the `name` value should be unambiguous.
